ygData.subject: Re: On Familiars...
ygData.msgSnippet: Familiars would be great.  I love the idea.  Have any of you seen the picture of the fairy dragon that was posted as a screen shot of the day? That would be
ygData.messageBody:
Familiars would be great. I love the idea. Have any of you seen the
picture of the fairy dragon that was posted as a screen shot of the day?
That would be AWSOME flying around your head just providing even a little
more mana and the visual would be GREAT! Make them do like 1-2 points of
damage with a chance of root in the sting and almost no hps. Change thier
wing colors with your level and make them give us like 5-100 more mana
(level dependent). That would be Amazingly awsome.

Rutreeii the now lusting wizard.
